summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the 2005 Adopted Budget, including the 2005-2010 Capital Improvement Program (CIP); changing appropriations to various departments and from various funds in the Budget; making cash transfers between various City funds and subfunds; removing a 2005 budget proviso; amending the CIP for Seattle Public Utilities; and creating positions, of which one is exempt; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
note: Second Quarter 2005 Supplemental Ordinance, Broadway Revitalization, Casa Latina
